text.text: 1: These 3 slots are where you put in what you want to melt. It may be ores, ingots, or anything else you feel like attempting to melt!
2: This is where your molten material will show. Remember that you may only have one molten material at a time in the melter.

3: This is where your fuel shows. If you have a heater it will appear as shown and you will be able to insert any item that can be used as fuel. If you have a seared tank it will show a bar with liquid fuel in it.
